name: Open Sorcery: Sea++
description:
You wake up at the bottom of a dark ocean, surrounded by your broken dreams.

Open Sorcery: Sea++ is a text-based game that explores the Web--the ocean-web of relationships and emotions that exists below our world.

Collect and assemble your memories. Learn spells.

Explore Fairyland, Hell, the Lost Soul's Diner, and many other places in your quest to return the surface and reclaim your physical body.
